channel.title: Academia on After Math
channel.description: Recent content in Academia on After Math

item.title: How Springer sent me to collections for adopting their textbook.
item.description: The story begins with one of those little mundane activities that fill every professor’s day. Right before the spring semester began I was evaluating various textbook options for the next time I teach undergraduate real analysis. Stephen Abbott’s Understanding Analysis published by Springer seemed to be exactly the kind of book I was looking for.
